title: Ultra-rich women in Europe in 2014 , by personal fortune value
yAxis: Value of wealth in billion euros
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Value of wealth in billion euros in the y axis.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
The lowest value at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) is 5.84x times less than the highest value at Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France).
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Value of wealth in billion euros in each Month on the y axis.
The Value of wealth in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and lowest at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Value of wealth in billion euros in the y axis.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
The lowest value at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) is 5.84x times less than the highest value at Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Value of wealth in billion euros for 10 number of Months.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
Month Susanne Klatten (BMW Germany) has the second highest value for Value of wealth in billion euros.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has 5.84 times more Value of wealth in billion euros than Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) which is has the lowest.

Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) is higher than any other Months with value 25.1, followed by Susanne Klatten (BMW Germany), and Johanna Quandt (BMW Germany). Down to Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) with the lowest value 4.3.
The Value of wealth in billion euros has decreased over the past 10 Months.
Similar Value of wealth in billion euros is found in Month Margarita Louis Dreyfus (Louis Dreyfus Switzerland), and Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden).
The Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) tends to be 2.89 percent lower than average.
